faq.question: Does it work with all academic journals?
faq.answer: Yes! Works with papers from any journal, conference proceedings, preprints, dissertations, and theses in PDF format.

faq.question: Can it extract specific data points?
faq.answer: Absolutely. After the initial summary, ask questions like 'What was the sample size?' or 'What statistical methods were used?' to extract specific details.

faq.question: How accurate are the summaries?
faq.answer: Our AI is trained specifically on academic papers and has 95%+ accuracy in extracting key findings, methodology, and conclusions.

faq.question: Can I use it for literature reviews?
faq.answer: Yes! Many researchers use SummarizePDF to quickly review dozens of papers and identify the most relevant studies for their literature review.

faq.question: Does it work with papers in other languages?
faq.answer: Currently optimized for English papers. Support for other languages coming soon.

faq.question: What's the pricing for academic users?
faq.answer: Starter plan ($9/mo) includes 50 papers. Pro plan ($19/mo) includes 200 papers. Special academic discounts available.
